  Efficient

categories:
  - tidyverse

draft: true
---

```{r setup, include = FALSE}
all_files <- dir_ls("posts", recurse = TRUE) |> 
  str_subset(".qmd") |> 
  str_subset("[0-9]+-[0-9]+-[0-9]+")

all_files|> 
  path_file()

orig_files <- all_files |> 
  fs::path_dir() |> 
  str_remove("posts/")

all_files |> 
  path_dir() |> 
  paste0("/", orig_files, ".qmd")
```
